name: Oberon
description: Healing and suffering do Oberon’s bidding. His command of the natural world supports allies. Boon to his friends, bane of his foes.

abilities.name: Smite
abilities.description: Focuses deadly energy within a target, dealing massive damage and removing all of its defenses, including Overguard. Enemies near the target also take a portion of the damage.

abilities.name: Hallowed Ground
abilities.description: Sanctifies the ground around Oberon, inflicting <DT_RADIATION_COLOR>Radiation Damage to all enemies within the radius. Also grants protection against Status Effects for Oberon and his allies.

abilities.name: Renewal
abilities.description: Generates a protective aura that grants bonus Armor to Oberon and his allies and restores allies’ Health over time. Healing is doubled while within the radius of Hallowed Ground.

abilities.name: Reckoning
abilities.description: Lifts enemies into the air and then hurls them down with conviction, removing their Armor. Enemies hit by this ability will grant Oberon additional Armor and have a chance to spawn a <HEALTH>Health Orb when they die.

languages.description: Heilung und Leid folgen Oberons Willen. Seine Kontrolle über die natürliche Welt nutzt er, um Verbündete zu unterstützen. Ein Segen für seine Freunde, ein Fluch für seine Feinde.
languages.name: Oberon

languages.description: La guérison et la souffrance répondent aux ordres d'Oberon. Sa maîtrise du monde naturel soutient les alliés. Aubaine pour ses amis, fléau pour ses ennemis.
languages.name: Oberon

languages.description: La guarigione e la sofferenza sono sottomessi a Oberon. La sua padronanza del mondo naturale supporta gli alleati. Una manna per i suoi amici, una maledizione per i suoi nemici.
languages.name: Oberon

languages.description: 오베론의 손 아래 치유와 고통이 자유자재로 다루어집니다. 자연의 세계를 다룰 수 있는 그의 힘은 아군을 보조하며, 아군에게는 이익을, 적에게는 위해를 가져다줍니다.
languages.name: 오베론

languages.description: La curación y el sufrimiento cumplen las órdenes de Oberon. Su dominio del mundo natural apoya a los aliados. Bendición para sus amigos, ruina para sus enemigos.
languages.name: Oberon

languages.description: 愈合和苦痛皆为 Oberon 所驱使。他对自然界的驾驭能够支援友军。朋友之福，敌人之祸。
languages.name: Oberon

languages.description: Исцеление и страдание выполняют приказы Оберона. Его власть над миром природы поддерживает союзников. Благо для друзей, проклятие для врагов.
languages.name: Оберон

languages.description: 癒しと苦しみは、Oberonの命に従う。彼は自然の力を従えて、味方をサポートする。味方には恩恵を、敵には災いを。
languages.name: Oberon

languages.description: Leczenie i zadawanie bólu jest domeną Oberona. Panuje on nad przyrodą, by wesprzeć swoich sojuszników i stać się zmorą wrogów.
languages.name: Oberon

languages.description: A cura e o sofrimento estão sob o comando de Oberon. Seu domínio do mundo natural concede suporte aos aliados. Uma bênção para seus amigos, e maldição para seus inimigos.
languages.name: Oberon

languages.description: 治療和苦痛聽從 Oberon 的吩咐。他對自然界的掌握可以支援友方。對朋友是福，對敵人是禍。
languages.name: Oberon

languages.description: การเยียวยาและสร้างความเจ็บปวดคือสิ่งที่ Oberon ทำ โดยควบคุมธรรมชาติที่มีอยู่ในโลกเพื่อนช่วยเหลือพันธมิตร เอื้อประโยชน์ให้มิตร จบชีวิตผู้เป็นศัตรู
languages.name: Oberon

languages.description: İyileşme ve ıstırap, Oberon'un vazifesidir. Doğal dünyaya olan hakimiyeti müttefikleri destekler. Dostlarına lütuf, düşmanlarına bela.
languages.name: Oberon

languages.description: Підкорювач зцілення та страждань. Оберон наказує силам природи підтримувати союзників. Що добре для друзів — прокляття для ворогів.
languages.name: Оберон
